bodyV2.markdown:
Currently, you can only redeem one voucher on a booking. 

If you have multiple vouchers you wish to use, please contact us via our Help Centre with all the voucher details you wish to use. Our dedicated team will then merge your current vouchers into one single voucher for you to redeem on your booking.

content.name: I have more than one voucher I want to use for a booking, how can I do this?
